name: Firewall Rule Request
about: Request a new GCP Network Firewall Policy rule

ðŸ”¹ Destination IP(s) or CIDR(s): ex. 10.1.2.0/24
ðŸ”¹ Port(s): ex. 443
ðŸ”¹ Protocol: ex. TCP
ðŸ”¹ Direction: ex. INGRESS
ðŸ”¹ Business Justification: A short explanation that will become the rule description in GCP
